a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Life expectancy vs. health spending, 1970 to 2023

The
period life expectancy
at birth, in a given year. Health expenditure includes all financing schemes and
covers all aspects of healthcare. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between

Health expenditure per capita, PPP
(international-$ in 2015 prices)
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); OECD Health Expenditure and Financing Database (2024)

international-$
at 2015 prices.
